A truck is a motor vehicle designed to transport cargo.
A moving truck or removalist truck is a large van or truck used to transport belongings during a move.
A moving truck is a truck used to move household goods from one location to another.
A moving truck is a truck used to transport personal and household goods from one location to another.
A moving truck is a truck designed to transport household goods from one location to another.
A moving truck is a truck used to move household goods from one residence to another.
A truck is a large vehicle that is designed to carry goods.

A truck is a motor vehicle designed to transport cargo. Trucks vary greatly in size, power, and configuration; smaller varieties may be mechanically similar to some automobiles. Commercial trucks can be very large and powerful, and may be configured to mount specialized equipment, such as in the case of fire trucks, concrete mixers, and suction excavators.
A truck (United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, UK) is a motor vehicle designed to transport cargo.
A truck or lorry is a motor vehicle designed to transport cargo.
A truck or lorry is a motor vehicle designed to transport cargo. Trucks vary greatly in size, power, and configuration, with the smallest being mechanically similar to an automobile.
A delivery truck is a truck used to deliver goods.
A moving truck is a truck used to move household goods from one location to another. Different sizes of moving truck are used for different sized loads.
This is a moving truck.
A delivery truck, or a van, is a commercial vehicle used for transporting goods from one location to another.
A moving truck is a van or truck used to transport moving boxes and other goods from one location to another. It is often referred to as a moving van.
The truck is a pickup truck.
A moving truck is a truck (usually a cargo truck) used to transport household goods from one location to another. Different sizes of moving truck are available for different sized loads.
A pickup truck is a light motor vehicle with an enclosed cab and an open cargo area with low sides and tailgate.
A pickup truck is a light-duty truck having an enclosed cab and an open cargo area with low sides and tailgate.
A moving van or moving truck is a vehicle used to transport personal possessions from one location to another.
A moving truck or removalist is a truck used to move household goods and other items from one location to another.
This is a semi-trailer truck.
A tow truck (also called a wrecker, a breakdown truck, recovery truck or a breakdown lorry) is a truck used to move disabled, improperly parked, impounded, or otherwise indisposed motor vehicles.
A semi-trailer truck (more commonly semi truck or simply "semi") is the combination of a tractor unit and one or more semi-trailers to carry freight.
The truck is a clean truck.
A semi-trailer truck is the combination of a tractor unit and one or more semi-trailers to carry freight.
The truck is a Ford F-150.
A van is a type of road vehicle used for transporting goods or people.

A moving company, removalist or van line is a company that helps people and businesses move their goods from one place to another. It offers all inclusive services for relocations like packing, loading, moving, unloading, unpacking, arranging of items to be shifted.

The Ford Transit is a range of light commercial vehicles produced by Ford since 1965. Sold primarily as a cargo van, the Transit is also built as a passenger van (marketed as the Tourneo since 1995), minibus, cutaway van chassis, and as a pickup truck.
